definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
Holland/the Netherlands/abbr. for 荷蘭|荷兰[He2 lan2]
to carry on one's shoulder or back/burden/responsibility
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: You will be given a sample of either caraway oil or spearmint oil.
sentences.chinese: 你將會收到一個葛縷子油或綠薄荷油樣品。

sentences.english: A candy or lozenge flavored with this oil.
sentences.chinese: 用胡椒薄荷油調味的糖果。

sentences.english: Adding a few drops of peppermint oil to your bath can lend an able assist as well.
sentences.chinese: 沐浴時，加放幾滴薄荷油也可緩解疲勞。

sentences.english: Why does Nutrilite Garlic Heart Care Formula contain peppermint?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼該產品包含薄荷油？
用胡椒薄荷油調味的糖果。

sentences.english: The total oil of the mint microencapsulations was measured by steam distillation method.
sentences.chinese: 採用水蒸氣蒸餾法測定了微膠囊化薄荷油的總油。

sentences.english: Why don't you apply some mentholatum here?
sentences.chinese: 你可不在這裏塗點薄荷油？

sentences.english: Alternatively, if you have toothpaste that contains peppermint oil, apply a dab.
sentences.chinese: 或者，如果你有含薄荷油的牙膏，用一點。

sentences.english: Peppermint oil is one of the well known cures for heart burn and indigestion.
sentences.chinese: 薄荷油是一個著名的醫治心臟病燒傷和消化不良。

sentences.english: Instead of scratching that insect bite, apply a drop or two of peppermint oil.
sentences.chinese: 不要抓撓昆蟲叮咬處，而是用一兩滴薄荷油。

sentences.english: Leonard: Why would you buy peppermint schnapps?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼要買薄荷油杜松子酒？

definition: essential balm containing menthol, eucalyptus oil etc, used as a mosquito repellant
